rdf:Description.dc:title: Oil sands composition and behaviour research : the research papers of John A. Bichard 1957-1965 1987
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Bichard, John A.
Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority.
Imperial Oil Limited.
Syncrude Canada Ltd.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Sponsored by: Imperial Oil Limited and Syncrude of Canada Ltd.

Collection of research papers on the Athabasca Oil Sands in northern Alberta, including composition (of oil sands, oil, minerals, water and gas), behaviour (flotation, additives, sand reduction and solvent dilution) and mechanisms (interfacial and microstructure).
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Oil sands
